Funny how anyone who shoots more than one person at a time is now mentally ill. This excuse brought to you by the mental health industry who is benefitting from government money to """"handle"""" or study the effects of """"mental"""" health and gun violence. When ever I see someone spout up that it's a mental health issue i just shake my head.. IOW another sheep just repeating talking points of special interest blindly. I do agree that this is a surface issue but it's not """"mental health"""".. perhaps our """"leaders"""" need to stop driving this country into the sewer and putting more pressure on the people and ultimately driving this wave of anger, rage, hopelessness, and despair into people. It's these pressures that cause people to do irrational acts. These acts of violence were never mental for many years.. they were irrational. Guns, like the flags, gays, religion, and all these designer issues, are nothing but distractions over other issues.

Evidently, a LOT of people don't know what """"race"""" has to do with this topic. I don't either! *laughs* They're reading this portion of my statement above, """"How dare you come into this discussion with YOUR black history and run down this woman who quit a very hard drug, a drug more addictive than Meth, Marijuana, and alcohol combined."""" Ok. First of all, the word black has multiple meanings, but what it shouldn't mean is African American, dark brown skin, or a reference to a breed of humans to more educated individuals. I understand Internet being on cell phones and Facebook opening up to the public means sometimes I need to take things down a level. synonyms for the word black in the context utilized above.
